resources.string: If this app has location permission your current location will be added. You can also add locations from Google Maps. Pick a location and use the share option selecting this app.
Make sure to share from a dropped pin to send latitude & longitude, not place names. You can also share as text in format \"lat, lon, name\".
Enter a name for this location
refresh forecast information for current locations
Are you sure you want to delete this location?
Hide this hour from now on
Restore back to showing all hours? You can drop hours again once they show using the bin icon.
You can change settings like weather model and units and threshold by selecting the value in the table displayed on top.
Use a large device or rotate to landscape to compare 2 weather models.
Note that some of these settings will need you to trigger a full data refresh by swiping down on the list.
To refresh content you can pull down on the list. Also on changing some of the settings this action is often required.
This is implemented this way so you can choose to keep data on locations with bad reception. As long as the app doesn\'t get closed it will re-open with the fetched data.
This app is open source and free and retrieves weather information from https://open-meteo.com.
More information on the app itself can be found on the project website at https://github.com/hanscappelle/windfoil-wind-finder-android-app
